snippet.title: Hot fixing my indie game to avoid negative Steam reviews!
snippet.description:
A Unity indie game devlog about making the game "Fireworks Mania" in my spare time, while having a wife, two kids, a full time day job and a dog. 

- Enjoy!

# FIREWORKS MANIA ON STEAM
➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1079260?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=youtube_video

# ALSO CHECK OUT THESE VIDEOS
➤ How I ALMOST released an update for my indie game
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hhZ-TthiQYQ
➤ Fireworks Mania Game Dev Log Playlist
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfRfKfCcFo_s49jOqbJv9rZBOHAdBLgFf
➤ 1.5 Years of Game Development in Unity
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-vlB8R6b9Q

# PEOPLE PLAYING FIREWORKS MANIA
➤ https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfRfKfCcFo_vIxxYpVQ-vNg8KfEX4r_Y-

# SOCIAL
Discord: https://discord.gg/SzZD77p
Twitter: https://twitter.com/laumania
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/laumania

# GAME DESCRIPTION
FIREWORKS MANIA is a small casual explosive simulator game where you play around with fireworks, create beautiful firework shows or just blow stuff up.

# MUSIC
Various Stream Beats songs - Thanks @Senpai and @harrisheller !
https://www.streambeats.com/

"Parisian Cafe" from the YouTube Audio library

#devlog #gamedev #fireworksmania #gamedevelopment #unity3d #madewithunity #indiedev #indiegame
